verbose_text: In order to investigate the efficacy of the specific signaling inhibitors on the phosphorylation of p65, ERK, JNK, p38 in NP cells at the early stage of N-Ac-PGP treatment, NP cells were pre-treated with U (1 mug/ml), SP (1 mug/ml), SB (1 mug/ml) and PDTC (1 mug/ml) for 30 min followed by N-Ac-PGP treatment (100 mug/ml) for 30 min, 30 min, 15 min and 15 min respectively.
evidence: phosphorylation of p65, ERK, JNK, p38
